title: Herbal Body Wash - 8oz - Store - Springtown Chiropractic & Wellness Center
description: Solutions4 Wash Herbal Cleanser is formulated for all skin types to flush out the pores and gently cleanse the skin without leaving alkaline residues. WASH contains a natural astringent to help tighten the skin and pores, yet it is not drying to the skin. It does not disrupt the skin's natural protective mantle, and is very gentle to the skin. For this reason, it is also ideal for make-up removal on delicate facial skin.
